definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: Tie up the white plastic cloth of double claw and wing.
sentences.chinese: 束缚着双爪和翅膀的白色胶布。

sentences.english: Another swathed himself in a raincoat and duct tape before fleeing the area a few hours later.
sentences.chinese: 另一面面和胶布雨衣前逃离该地区几个小时后他自己。

sentences.english: Two ends of the rod were tied with a white thread and fixed on the skin near nose with plastic tape.
sentences.chinese: 用白线结扎硅胶条二端后以胶布固定在鼻旁皮肤上。

sentences.english: Scotch taped the remaining windscreen and carrying on.
sentences.chinese: 用胶布粘牢余留的挡风玻璃，继续前进。

sentences.english: Suitable for measuring blankets & rollers in the graphic arts industry.
sentences.chinese: 适合测量印刷业使用的胶布及墨辊之硬度。

sentences.english: Use the adhesive plaster to connect the film and paper pipe tightly after fixing.
sentences.chinese: 穿好胶膜后用胶布将胶膜牢牢的贴在收料纸管上。

sentences.english: Vertically into the needle, gently rotate Des needle extraction, good adhesive plaster paste.
sentences.chinese: 垂直进针，悄悄转动拔除辅针，贴好胶布。

sentences.english: Finally the various applications of TPU coated fabric in inflatable materials were concluded.
sentences.chinese: 总结了TPU胶布在各种充气囊体材料中的应用。

sentences.english: His mouth was taped, his hands and feet bound with curtain cord.
sentences.chinese: 他的嘴上粘着胶布，手脚给窗帘拉索捆着。

sentences.english: Remove the tapes and gauze at ends of the polythene tubings.
sentences.chinese: 用纱布和胶布将胶管一端固定。

sentences.english: People can paste transparent rubberized fabric along the edges to reinforce the bag if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 有心的话还可以在边缘贴透明胶布起加固作用。

sentences.english: Stick the end of cover tape.

sentences.chinese: 您是否需要一些胶布呢？

sentences.english: Drum vulcanizing machine for continuous vulcanization of various adhesive fabric of a device.
sentences.chinese: 鼓式硫化机用以连续硫化各种涂胶布类的一种设备。

sentences.english: He taped a note to the door.
sentences.chinese: 他用胶布把一张便条贴在门上。

sentences.english: We put insulating tape on electric wires.
sentences.chinese: 我们给电线裹上了绝缘胶布。

definition: variant of 棉籤|棉签[mian2 qian1]/cotton swab
